title: Depth Of Market
content:
The indicator displays the current bid and ask levels and their volumes in real time.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Histogram size

NameDescription
Visual Mode Allows you to select one of the available display modes for this element.

Options:
  • Levels
  • Cumulative
  • Both
Use auto size If enabled, the maximum element size is determined automatically, otherwise it is set in the settings.
Proportion volume Defines the maximum volume size for determining the proportionality factor.
Width Defines the width of the histogram element.
Right to left If enabled, the display direction is set from right to left, otherwise from left to right.

Levels mode

NameDescription
Bid rows Sets the color for displaying bid volumes.
Text Color Sets the color of the label text.
Ask rows Sets the color for displaying ask volumes.
Bids background Sets the background color for the element displaying bid volumes.
Asks background Sets the background color for the element displaying ask volumes.
Best bid background Sets the background color for the element displaying best bid volumes.
BestAsk Background Sets the background color for the element displaying best ask volumes.
Filters Defines a list of filters with a given maximum volume and corresponding color.

Cumulative mode

NameDescription
Ask Color Defines the color of the element that displays the ask level in the cumulative trade mode.
Bid Color Defines the color of the element that displays the bid level in the cumulative trade mode.

Other

NameDescription
Show Cumulative Values Determines the possibility of enabling the display of accumulated transaction values in the price flow on the exchange.
Custom height of price levels Defines a custom price level height size.

Scale

NameDescription
Use scale If this option is enabled, the scale with the specified value is used, otherwise it is automatic.
Custom scale Defines the scale value for the element.
